content:
Thanks to @Tommy Ip's work during GCI (and some much more recent work on picking out an icon), we now display messages sent by bot users with a little icon next to their names to indicate they are a bot. See #commits or #twitter for what this looks like. I'd love some feedback on how this feels!

@Kevin Riggle FYI :)
It's been around for a little bit already right? I thought I've been seeing it for the past few days. Looks great
Yep, it's been around for a few days, but I forgot to advertise it :)
